title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Emergency Remote Education Experience-Based Science Leadership Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement effective communication strategies in emergency remote teaching environments.
Learners can create and utilize microlearning content that delivers scientific knowledge under limited technological resources.
Learners can develop digital leadership strategies to strengthen team connectivity and apply them to real projects.
Learners can establish optimized learning material strategies considering data costs and technological accessibility constraints.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
